## Public Member Functions

### commit() {#aa633fcd4ff4b9eb332ba7f26d090c10a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;FileOutputBuffer.cpp&#125;::InMemoryBuffer::commit ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Flushes the content of the buffer to its file and deallocates the buffer.

If <a href="#aa633fcd4ff4b9eb332ba7f26d090c10a">commit()</a> is not called before this object&#39;s destructor is called, the file is deleted in the destructor. The optional parameter is used if it turns out you want the file size to be smaller than initially requested.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/fileoutputbuffer-cpp/#l00091">91</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/fileoutputbuffer-cpp">FileOutputBuffer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
